attributes.action: stop the closure of Harton Village Post Office in South Shields, Tyne & Wear.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harton Village Post Office lies at the centre of a vibrant community in the suburbs of South Shields. It is well used by local people and provides a vital resource for many, especially local pensioners and businesses. The nearest post offices are also well used and are not easily accessible to local residents.
